title: Chunky Rhubarb Applesauce

ingredients.name: rhubarb, trimmed and cut into 1/2-inch chunks
tart apples, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch chunks

instructions: Place rhubarb, apples and sugar to taste in a large saucepan. Cover and simmer until fruit is tender, about 40 minutes.
Stir in cinnamon and nutmeg. Serve warm or cold.
